title: 14K YELLOW GOLD HUGGIE WITH ROUND AND PEAR DIAMOND CHARM
description: A 12.5MM hoop earring in 14k yellow gold, featuring a removable drilled round and pear diamond charm.
details:
Metal: 14K yellow gold hoop, platinum loop
Stone Type: Lab-grown diamond
Stone Color: F
Stone Clarity: VS+
Stone Shape: Pear and round-cut
Closure: Post
Size: 12.5MM
Drilled diamonds are linked with platinum loops for added strength and security. Each diamond is selected for its perfect visual match, which means final carat weight may vary slightly per item.
Single Earring 0.50 CTW
